name: test_ssh_root_login_disabled[DE-DUS]
description:
REQ-001: SSH Root Login must be disabled.
        Logic: Check /etc/ssh/sshd_config for 'PermitRootLogin no'.
        (Marked as xfail: Currently we use root user for automation, architectural exception).
descriptionHtml:
REQ-001: SSH Root Login must be disabled.
    Logic: Check /etc/ssh/sshd_config for 'PermitRootLogin no'.
    (Marked as xfail: Currently we use root user for automation, architectural exception).
statusMessage:
XFAIL Root login required for current CI/CD (Task OPS-001)

AssertionError: ⛔ DE-DUS allows Root Login! Please fix /etc/ssh/sshd_config
assert False
 +  where False = <bound method File.contains of <file /etc/ssh/sshd_config>>('PermitRootLogin no')
 +    where <bound method File.contains of <file /etc/ssh/sshd_config>> = <file /etc/ssh/sshd_config>.contains
statusTrace:
tests/test_audit_rules.py:120: in test_ssh_root_login_disabled
    assert ssh_config.contains("PermitRootLogin no"), \
E   AssertionError: ⛔ DE-DUS allows Root Login! Please fix /etc/ssh/sshd_config
E   assert False
E    +  where False = <bound method File.contains of <file /etc/ssh/sshd_config>>('PermitRootLogin no')
E    +    where <bound method File.contains of <file /etc/ssh/sshd_config>> = <file /etc/ssh/sshd_config>.contains
